long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitcichain Wallet is an innovative cold wallet mechanism that enables storage and management of crypto assets in a very user-friendly way.

Prioritizing security with its state-of-the-art technological infrastructure, Bitcichain Wallet provides users to safely transfer their crypto assets within seconds and to see their portfolio at a glance.

Unlike similar wallet ecosystems, Bitcichain Wallet does not require from users to manually add/remove tokens or coins, since it automatically detects and place the crpyto assets on the wallet interface.

Works as an extension of Google Chrome, Bitcichain Wallet enables transactions on all EVM supported blockchain platforms.
